docs.summary: This endpoint retrieves payment settings from your app.
description:
Wix calls this endpoint during the payment process. For example, when a customer inserts credit card details and places an order.
This endpoint retrieves the payment settings to apply, and Wix passes on the settings to the payment provider.

> __Notes:__
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by an app and can have an arbitrary URL. Therefore, ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

This function is not a universal function and runs only on the backend.

members.name: orderRefunded
members.doc: Additional info about order refunded activity (optional). `activity.type` must be `ORDER_REFUNDED`.

members.name: orderRefunded
members.doc: Additional info about order refunded activity (optional). `activity.type` must be `ORDER_REFUNDED`.

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code for future processing.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc:
Optional - Line items associated with this additional fee.
If no `lineItemIds` are provided, the fee will be associated with the whole cart/checkout/order.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
* `"GLOBAL"` - discount applies to entire order.
* `"SPECIFIC-ITEMS"` - discount applies to specific items.
* `"SHIPPING"` - discount applies to shipping. For example, free shipping.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items discount applies to.

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Balance amount, can be negative. Negative value signifies amount to be refunded
and can happen due to possible overcharge or modified manual order.

description:
Order balance. Reflects amount left to be paid on order and is calculated dynamically. Can be negative per balance definition.
`amount` field depends on order payment status:
+ UNSPECIFIED, NOT_PAID: price_summary.total_price
+ PARTIALLY_PAID : price_summary.total_price - pay_now.total_price
+ PENDING, REFUNDED, PARTIALLY_REFUNDED, PAID : 0

members.name: balance
members.doc: collectible amount to pay. Part of orderâ€™s price_summary excluding all approved payments amount

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID. Auto-created if one does not yet exist. For more information, see [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/introduction).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is not a member).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is not a member).

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog. For items from Wix apps, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `bookingId` for Wix Bookings.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional info in key:value pairs. For example, to specify Wix Stores product options or variants:
+ `{"options": {"options": {"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}}`
+ `{"options": {"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}}`

description: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system.

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system.

members.name: type
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order.

members.name: code
members.doc: HEX or RGB color code for display.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line color name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line color name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3 capital letters string representing a currency according to ISO-4217

members.name: identity
members.doc: The identification type and identity data

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: App instance ID of SPI in context

members.name: languages
members.doc: A string representing a language and region in the format of "xx-XX". First 2 letters represent the language code according to ISO 639-1. This is followed by a dash "-", and then a by 2 capital letters representing the region according to ISO 3166-2

members.name: requestId
members.doc: A unique identifier for each request. Can be used for logging / troubleshooting

description:
this message is not directly used by any service,
it exists to describe the expected parameters that SHOULD be provided to invoked Velo methods as part of open-platform.
e.g. SPIs, event-handlers, etc..
NOTE: this context object MUST be provided as the last argument in each Velo method signature.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data in key-value form. For example, `{ "Ticket number": "123456" }`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the custom activity.

members.name: type
members.doc: Custom activity type. For example, `"Ticket number set"`.

members.name: deliverByDate
members.doc: Deprecated - Latest expected delivery date and time in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time in free text. For example, `"3-5 business days"`.

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for carrier. For example, `"Please knock on the door. If unanswered, please call contact number. Thanks."`.

members.name: from
members.doc: starting time of the delivery time slot

members.name: to
members.doc: ending time of the delivery time slot

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line item according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: fileId
members.doc: ID of the secure file in media.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link will exist after the digital links have been generated on the order.

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for edit, given by user (optional).

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

members.name: statuses
members.doc: Unique string values based on Fulfillment entities statuses

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If ID is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set, `UNSPECIFIED` is not allowed.

description: Full contact details for an address

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate percentage, as a decimal numeral between 0 and 1. For example, `"0.13"`.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Taxable amount of this line item.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: The calculated tax, based on the `taxableAmount` and `taxRate`.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount associated with this item. (Discount amount for item / additional fee amount for item)

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the exchanged line item.

members.name: deltaType
members.doc: Type of quantity change: increase or decrease.

members.name: diff
members.doc: Difference between original and new quantity. Absolute value.

members.name: affectedLineItems
members.doc: Line items additional fee applies to.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount name: coupon name / discount rule name / merchant discount description.

members.name: discountReason
members.doc:
Pre-defined discount reason (optional).
* `"ITEMS_EXCHANGE"` - exchange balance acquired as a result of items exchange.

members.name: discountReason
members.doc:
Pre-defined discount reason (optional).
* `"ITEMS_EXCHANGE"` - exchange balance acquired as a result of items exchange.

members.name: exchangeOrderId
members.doc: ID of the new order created as a result of an exchange of items.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: IDs of the items that were exchanged.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the order was created in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the order was last updated in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Additional fees applied to the order.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for the pricing of this order in [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#List_of_ISO_4217_currency_codes) format.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the site owner's business manager (auto-generated).

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Order payment status.
+ `NOT_PAID` - This can be an order made online, but not yet paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `INITIALIZED`.
+ This status also applies when an offline order needs to be manually marked as paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `APPROVED`.
+ `PAID` - All payments associated with this order are paid. For online payments: [`payment.regularPaymentDetails.status: APPROVED`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object). For gift cards: [`payment.giftCardPaymentDetails.voided: false`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object).
+ `PARTIALLY_REFUNDED` - Order was refunded, but refund amount is less than order total price.
+ `FULLY_REFUNDED` - Order fully refunded. Refund amount equals total price.
+ `PENDING` - Payments received but not yet confirmed by the payment provider.
+ `PARTIALLY_PAID` -  At least one payment was received and approved, covering less than total price amount.

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: seenByAHuman
members.doc: Whether a human has seen the order. Set when an order is clicked on in the Business Manager.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping info and selected shipping option details.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Order status.
+ `INITIALIZED` - Order was created, but not yet approved or declined.
+ `APPROVED` - Order was approved. This happens when either the online payment succeeded or the order is an offline order.
+ Once an order is approved, many side effects are triggered. For example, holding of stock in the inventory and sending of notification emails.
+ `CANCELED` - Order was canceled by the user.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: originalOrderId
members.doc: ID of the original order for which the exchange happened.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
References to the line item's origin catalog.
This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Item's price amount to be charged during checkout, relevant for items with payment option DEPOSIT_ONLINE

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc:
Fulfiller ID. Field is empty when the line item is self-fulfilled.
To get fulfillment information, pass the order ID to [List Fulfillments For Single Order](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-fulfillments/list-fulfillments-for-single-order).

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` - Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price after line item discounts for display purposes.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Line item price before line item discounts for display purposes. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: restockQuantity
members.doc: quantity of inventory requested to be returned. Whether to restock or ignore the request is up the vertical.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Total discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: manual
members.doc: Whether order was refunded manually. For example, via payment provider or using cash.

members.name: requires3dSecure
members.doc:
Whether to apply [3D Secure](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-3d-secure-3ds-payments-with-third-party-payment-providers) during the payment process.

> __Note:__
> + Not all payment providers offer this feature in their Wix integration.
> + If the SPI call fails, the value set in the [extension configuration](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/payment-settings-integration-spi/introduction#configuration) for `fallbackValueForRequires3DSecure` will be used.

members.name: deploymentUri
members.doc:
Required.** Base URI which Wix eCommerce will call to retrieve the payment settings.
For example, `"deploymentUri": "https://my-payment-settings"`

members.name: fallbackValueForRequires3dSecure
members.doc:
The value to set for `paymentSettings.requires3dSecure` if the SPI call fails.

Default: `false`

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line plain text value in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line plain text value according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Required.** Original price description in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated price description according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax.

members.name: totalAdditionalFees
members.doc: Total price of additional fees before tax.

members.name: original
members.doc:
__Required.__ Original item name in site's default language.
Min: 1 character
Max: 200 characters

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Optional. Translated item name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.
Min: 1 character
Max: 400 characters

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: App Def Id of external provider which was a source of shipping info

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code (or ID) of selected shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"``.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Shipping option title.
For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"` or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Shipping price after all discounts (if any exist), and after tax.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of shipping region. For example, `"Metropolitan London"`, or `"Outer Melbourne suburbs"`.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Subscription cycle. For example, if this order is for the 3rd cycle of a subscription, value will be `3`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionDescription
members.doc: Subscription option description. For example, `"1kg of selected coffee, once a month"`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionTitle
members.doc: Subscription option title. For example, `"Monthly coffee Subscription"`.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: newTotal
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax. After update

members.name: originalTotal
members.doc: Orderâ€™s total price after discounts and tax. Before update

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations
